subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
lead_paragraph: Darren Evans ran for a team-record 253 yards and a touchdown and host Virginia Tech continued its Thursday night mastery, beating No. 23 Maryland.
snippet: Darren Evans ran for a team-record 253 yards and a touchdown and host Virginia Tech continued its Thursday night mastery, beating No. 23 Maryland.
